cause.description:
THIS CAUSE IS TO SPREAD AWARENESS ABOUT LYMPHOMA AND TO HELP RAISE MONEY TO SUPPORT LYMPHOMA RESEARCH IN ORDER TO FIND A CURE.
1. EVERYONE HAS A RIGHT TO BE HAPPY, HEALTHY AND FULL OF LIFE...SUPPORT LYMPHOMIA RESEARCH TO ENSURE THAT RIGHT!
cause.mission: FIND A CURE AND HELP THOSE IN NEED!
cause.name: FIND A CURE: LYMPHOMA
